# WoW Tooltip System Test

This document demonstrates the tooltip system with various examples.

## Enhanced Syntax Testing

**Display Text Override:**
- {{spell:133 "FB"}} (custom display text)
- {{custom.items:free_action_potion "FAP"}} (abbreviated name)

**Flag Testing:**
- {{spell:133 no-icon}} (no inline icon)
- {{spell:2136 "Fire Blast" no-icon}} (custom text, no icon)
- {{custom.items:free_action_potion no-tooltip-icon}} (has inline icon but no tooltip icon)
- {{spell:116 "Frostbolt" no-icon no-tooltip-icon}} (minimal display)

ENCHANT: {{spell:20034}}

**Mixed Examples:**
Use {{spell:133 "FB"}} and {{spell:2136 "FB2" no-icon}} in your rotation for maximum DPS.

## Complex Example

### Chromaggus Strategy

**Phase 1:**
- Tank positions boss at north wall
- Melee stack behind boss
- Ranged spread 10 yards apart
- Use {{custom.items:free_action_potion}} when you get {{spell:23170}}

**Phase 2 (Breath Combos):**
- Fire + Shadow: Pop {{custom.items:greater_fire_protection_potion}}
- Frost + Nature: Priests use {{spell:10901}} on raid
- Arcane + Time Lapse: Just heal through it

**Consumables:**
- Main tank: {{custom.items:flask_of_supreme_power}} + {{custom.items:greater_fire_protection_potion}}
- Healers: Max mana consumables
- DPS: {{custom.items:flask_of_supreme_power}} if available

**Achievement:** Clear this for {{custom.achievements:naxx_cleared_2024}}!
